snippet.title: Alliance Peacefighter Demo Teaser
snippet.description:
Play the demo and wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3538210/Alliance_Peacefighter/

Alliance Peacefighter is a linear, story-driven space sim in the vein of the X-Wing and Wing Commander games, with an aesthetic somewhere between Homeworld and Star Fox. Built for VR and traditional monitors. Full support for VR motion controllers, Steam Deck, HOTAS joysticks, gamepads and mouse/keyboard.

Coming Q2 2024

Website: http://urbanlogic.games/alliance-peacefighter/
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/designerbradley.bsky.social
Mastodon: https://mastodon.gamedev.place/@designerbradley
